meanings.definition: Not relating to or caused by a parasite.
meanings.sent1: The doctor confirmed that the patient's illness was nonparasitic.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the nonparasitic bacteria in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The nonparasitic relationship between the two countries was based on mutual respect.
meanings.sent4: Her nonparasitic attitude towards work set her apart from her colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The nonparasitic nature of the plant made it thrive independently.

meanings.definition: Not living as a parasite on or in another organism.
meanings.sent1: The nonparasitic insect fed on plants rather than other animals.
meanings.sent2: The nonparasitic fungi in the forest played a crucial role in the ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The nonparasitic squirrel enjoyed gathering nuts for itself.
meanings.sent4: The nonparasitic fish swam freely in the clear waters of the lake.
meanings.sent5: The nonparasitic bird built its nest without relying on other species.
